name: Mind Your Own Business
description:
This game was created as a 3rd semester project at the University of Applied Science, Darmstadt.

Frederike Hantschel - Game Design, UI/ UX Design

Jaina Tschritter - Programmer, Production Manager

Lasse Foster - Lead Programmer

Ben Hekimoglu - 3D/2D Artist, Sound Manager

Simon Haase - Sound Producer
